name: v1.5.1 - Documentation Update
body:
## Documentation Update

Comprehensive README documentation for all features.

### New Documentation
- **ComfyUI Model Presets** - All 4 presets with style guides
- **Versatile Preset Style Table** - Quick reference for model/CFG/prompts
- **vLLM Model Configuration** - Recommended models by VRAM size
- **Service Management Options** - Start/stop/configure/update/reinstall
- **Self-Update Feature** - Tools menu option 6
- **Docker UFW Integration** - Security documentation

### Features Already Included (since v1.0)
- Interactive menu system with status indicators
- System Settings, AI Services, Tools sub-menus
- NVIDIA version selection (550/560/570)
- First-run detection and auto-boot
- ComfyUI presets (Photorealistic, Versatile, Fast, Lightweight)
- Model configuration for vLLM, Ollama, ComfyUI
- Self-update from GitHub
- Docker UFW firewall integration
